name: Get That Nut
description:
“Get That Nut” is a minimal game in which players help a squirrel gather the last acorns left in its brutally cold forrest. As players progress through the five levels, they must adapt to the forest, and use the skills they learned to continue through the forest.

The game’s mechanics such as climbing walls and interactive objects compliment the game’s forest winter theme in that players will encounter obstacles and terrain that they must overcome to advance to the next level. Obstacles can include falling trees, snowballs, and steep cliffs. Players will have to learn and apply their knowledge of the environment while navigating through the obstacles and terrain by jumping, climping, and pushing across the platforms of each level as they navigate the squirrel to the acorn of each level.
